1378420.name: RPG Maker MZ - Krachware User Interface Material
1378420.description:
Continuing with the successful line of UI packs from Gee Kun Soft is Krachware User Need classical style UIs for your fantasy game project?
How about some beautifully drawn elegant windowskins, with floral gold and silver frames for fancy titles and impressive openings for your new RPG project? This pack's got them all!

As well as 144 windowskins and 52 title frames, this pack also has gorgeous system graphics for "Game Over" and "Now Loading" as well as useful number icons. And to round it out there's Bonus Material including 135 buttons, gothic and fantasy circles, text ribbons and more for any fantasy RPG projects!

Features:

* titles2 folder: 52 frames (16 designs x 3-6 patterns) for openings and more!
* system folder: 144 windowskins (36 designs x 4 colors), number icons, 8 x "Game Over", 6 x "Now Loading"
* bonus folder: 135 buttons (45 designs x 3 sizes), other 38 materials with circles, ribbons and more!
** Please note that you need the editing software to work with some of the material in "bonus" folder for RPG Makers**
*Compatible with RPG Maker MV and MZ
* For use with RPG Makers, Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice!
1378420.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
